data.message: According to Wikipedia, div doesn't really do anything, it's only used for grouping parts of a certain document, maybe they used div to make it easier to manipulate buttons using CSS and JS?
I believe so, may be for buttons state !! but also I notcied that facebook is using links everywhere and format it as a buttons and rarely used buttons/inputs wired!!
I think this might be a coding convention, or something that's required by whatever JS framework they're using, it also might be generated automatically, not written.
